question: Is cathepsin L active in endosomes?
ideal_answer:
yes,
Cathepsin L is found in the Late Endosome/Lysosome.

snippets.text: Cathepsin L in the Late Endosome/Lysosome

Immunofluorescence and immunoblotting investigations revealed the presence of cathepsin L in the nuclear compartment in addition to its expected endo-lysosomal localization in colorectal carcinoma cells.
cleavage by the endosomal/lysosomal protease cathepsin L
